Texts.Chs: 关于绘世者最强防御日志。
Texts.Eng: A log about the strongest defense of the Skath.

Texts.Chs: 《堡垒世界》有助于巩固绘世者在宇宙学舞台上的地位。由于这些世界对任何和所有可能的侵略者构成直接威胁，任何胆敢*考虑*奴隶制的人都面临着复仇的威胁。
Texts.Eng: Fortress Worlds were instrumental in cementing the Skathian position on the cosmological stage. With these worlds acting as a direct threat to any and all possible aggressors, there is the ever-present threat of vengeance for anyone even daring to *think* about slavery.

Texts.Chs: 第一次接触战争使绘世者成为已知星系中最偏执的种族之一，虽然他们会否认这是恐惧，而是将其归结为“紧张”，但毫无疑问，绘世者受惊时会做出经典的“战或逃”反应。所以，想象一下他们在背后的计划是多么的偏执。
Texts.Eng: The First Contact war made the Skath into one of the most paranoid races in the known galaxy. While they will deny that it is fear, and instead chalk it up to 'nerves', there is no doubt to the classic fight-or-flight response a Skath enters when startled. So imagine just how paranoid they could get with *planning* behind it.

Texts.Chs: 在当今时代，绘世者武装部队的规模大小是不可估量的，仅凭他们的存在，不结盟世界联盟就已经成为与保护国并驾齐驱的竞争者。
Texts.Eng: The sheer size and weight of the Skathian armed forces in the current age is beyond reckoning, and through their presence alone the League of Non-Aligned Worlds has become a contender alongside the Protectorate.

Texts.Chs: 这种偏执直接导致了堡垒世界的诞生。这些都是由议会随机选出的，并被宣布为圣地。然后，它们被清除掉所有非绘世者生命形式，表面几乎覆盖着任何可用的武器。其中数十亿门大炮、导弹发射井、重力发射器和已知宇宙中最大的军事集结平台。
Texts.Eng: This paranoia led directly to the creation of Fortress Worlds. These are elected at random by the Council and declared holy sites. They are then cleansed of all non-Skath lifeforms and their surface virtually covered in weaponry of any available sort. Billions of cannons, missile silos, gravity launchers and the largest military staging platforms in the known universe.
